items.sentence: Tom can\'t really see anything from where he is.
Tom just found out that Mary is already married.
I didn\'t let Tom know what we were going to do.
I didn\'t like the way that Tom treated his dog.
I didn\'t notice what time it was that Tom left.
I didn\'t realize I needed to be here yesterday.
I didn\'t realize that Tom wanted me to do that.
Don\'t you even want to know what Tom gave Mary?
Tom is still trying to convince Mary to help us.
Tom pointed out the mistakes that Mary had made.
Tom and Mary are giving a party on Friday night.
Tom still doesn\'t know who\'s going to do that.
Tom made me do some things I didn\'t want to do.
An old man was at the gate checking the tickets.
Tom never asked Mary to show him how to do that.
I\'ll do everything that you\'ve asked me to do.
Even Tom wouldn\'t be stupid enough to eat that.
Tom gently took Mary\'s hands and squeezed them.
I believe you have information that can help us.
I\'m telling you this because you\'re my friend.
